about_the_game:
Episode 2—— Dualism



The 1990s, a golden age for game, comic, and film industries. In our story, the little boy is growing. You need to help him endure the growing pains, face the pressure of study, and make tough choices that may change the course of his life…

The episode provides rich plots with various sideline contents, including multiple playable mini-games on different consoles, more achievements to acquire, as well as Electric Pets to collect, raise and fight. Enjoy this shared memory and the well placed Easter eggs!

Friendly Reminder: Certain sideline plots in Episode 2 is related to the choices you made in the Episode 1. /b]
